title: Looking for a T206 F. Smith WHITE cap old mill or white sox  cycle or american beauty
author: milkit1

posts.post_title: Looking for a T206 F. Smith WHITE cap old mill or white sox  cycle or american beauty
posts.post_content: Not sure if those backs even exist but if you got one let me know :)
Exists with Old Mill, but not with Cycle or American Beauty.  Good luck.
There was an Old Mill F. Smith card in what looked to be Fair condition that just sold on eBay Tuesday afternoon for $16.50...hope that you were the winning bidder on it :) .
unfortunatly it was the wrong one :(
bump, just realised my mistake in putting the wrong smith down. looking for white cap smith thanks!

The F. Smith White Cap (Chicago) exists in Old Mill, but not in Cycle or American Beauty.

The F. Smith White Cap (Chicago and Boston) exists with all three (OM, AB460, and Cycle 460).

Hope this helps...and good luck with your search!
Thanks! That's kinda neat that the rarer card Has more back options.
